mapper.select: SELECT id, name, phone, login_pwd AS loginPwd, login_salt AS loginSalt, status, principal, total_unit AS totalUnit, total, create_time AS createTime FROM `trustee` WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT r.`code` FROM trustee_role tr LEFT JOIN role r ON tr.role_id = r.id WHERE tr.trustee_id = #{id} AND r.status = 0 ORDER BY tr.role_id DESC

SELECT p.`code` FROM role_permission rp LEFT JOIN trustee_role tr ON tr.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = tr.role_id WHERE tr.trustee_id = #{id} AND r.status = 0 AND p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
